title: Chandigarh: Over 4,000 houses ordered to install rooftop solar panels or lose property
description: The Chandigarh administration has issued notices to 4,000 homes of 500 sq yards or more, mandating the installation of rooftop solar power plants within two months or face property resumption. This move has sparked backlash from residents and criticism from MP Manish Tewari, who termed it coercive. The administration urges residents to utilize the PM Surya Ghar-Muft Bijli Yojana for subsidies.
